DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy 10-week intervention , use Nordic Hamstring exercise , repeated-sprint ability male sub-elite football player . The primary outcome measure total sprint time 4x6 sprint 10 meter measure use dual-beam photoelectric cell . Additionally , eccentric knee flexor strength measure use Nordbord hamstring strength measure . The hypothesis strength training knee flexor muscle elicit Nordic Hamstring exercise result enhance repetitive sprint-ability express decrease total sprint time . Furthermore , baseline data use assess correlation eccentric hamstring strength active hamstring flexibility AND sprint performance .
DOC.brief_title: Nordic Hamstring Repeated-sprint Ability Football ( Soccer ) Players
DOC.criteria: Subelite Danish football player Age 1735 . Able participate fully competitive football activity time test Hamstring pain resulting loss training match 2 month prior study initiation . Specific systematic strength training hamstring muscle ( > 1/week ) precede 2 month study initiation . Specific systematic sprint training ( > 1/week ) precede 2 month study initiation . Longstanding injury ( > 6 week ) low extremity precede 6 month study initiation .
